answers.answer: In that case see a corneal specialist EYE MD ophthalmologist. find one at www.aao.org  possible causes include irregular astigmatism, keratoconus, early cataract, undiagnosed diabetes, macular disease.JCH MD

question: I have been trying to get  prescription glasses for 2 years and no matter where I go no one seems to know how to help me, My prescription seem to change even while I am sitting in the eye DR. chair even they have said that is wird can you please help me? Thank You
